about.description: As a junior full-stack engineer, I bring enthusiasm, dedication, and a strong sense of initiative to every project. Self-motivated and goal-oriented, I excel in independently managing tasks while also thriving in collaborative environments where teamwork drives innovation. My meticulous attention to detail, organizational abilities, and robust analytical and communication skills ensure high-quality outcomes. I am committed to continuous learning, with a focus on practical skills such as data analysis, pattern recognition, and trend identification. My key interests include securing physical and cloud infrastructure, designing user interfaces that harmonize compliance with creativity, and proactively addressing potential challenges to deliver seamless solutions.

Education.title: Cape Peninsula University of Technology
Education.description: I am currently pursuing a Diploma in ICT Applications Development at Cape Peninsula University of Technology (CPUT). In my first year, I cover a wide range of foundational topics including Programming, ICT Fundamentals, Multimedia Foundations, Applications Development, and Communications Networks. Additionally, I develop skills in Business Practice, Professional Communications, and Project Management. These courses provide me with a solid foundation in both technical and soft skills, equipping me to tackle real-world ICT challenges and contribute effectively to the industry.

Education.title: Life Choices Academy
Education.description: I attended Life Choices Coding Academy from April to September, completing an intensive 6-month web development course. This comprehensive program equipped me with the skills to design and implement websites, propelling me towards becoming a versatile software developer. I honed my technical skills and developed essential soft skills, empowering me to tackle complex coding challenges and drive innovative solutions.

Education.title: Oaklands High School
Education.description: I embarked on my academic journey at Oaklands High School in Lansdowne, Cape Town, where I spent five formative years (Grade 8-12). As a maths and science-focused institution, Oaklands provided the ideal environment for my curiosity in computer science to flourish. I proudly capped off my high school career in 2023, achieving a Bachelor's Pass in my Matriculation exams. This milestone marked the beginning of my pursuit of excellence in the tech industry.

Skills.title: HyperText Markup Language (HTML)
Skills.description-3: •Specialized Knowledge of Web Markup Language & Semantic HTML

Skills.title: Vue.js
Skills.description-1: •Advanced Vue.js Architecture (Modular Components, Optimized Templates, Custom Lifecycle Hooks)
Skills.description-2: •Expert-level Vue Router Configuration & State Management with Vuex/Pinia
Skills.description-3: •Mastering Complex Vue Component Interactions & Template Optimization Techniques

Skills.title: Node.js
Skills.description-1: •Advanced Event-Driven Programming with Custom Event Emitters
Skills.description-2: •Designing Scalable RESTful APIs with Node.js Frameworks
Skills.description-3: •Building High-Performance Web Applications with Express.js and Middleware

Skills.title: Python
Skills.description-1: • Familiarity with Python basics (data structures, functions, OED)
Skills.description-2: • Experience with Flask framework (web development, API integration)
Skills.description-3: • Understanding of control structures and data types

Skills.title: C++
Skills.description-1: • Understanding of variables, data types, and operators
Skills.description-2: • Familiarity with control structures and functions
Skills.description-3: • Working knowledge of pointers and memory management

Skills.description: •Computer Literate - Able to utilize Microsoft Office Programs

Work Experience.description: •Currently a software engineering intern at Life Choices Studio (from September 2024) - Honing my skills in C++ and Python while contributing to software development projects and expanding my cloud computing expertise through AWS Cloud Practitioner classes, collaborating with senior engineers to develop industry-aligned solutions.

Volunteering Experience.description: •Job shadowing (nursing) at Eerste River Hospital for a duration of 2 years (2021-2022) during school holidays - Working in a fast paced environment
•Assisting prefects with their duties throughout the course of 2023 - Teamwork and Compassion

Badges.title: AWS Skills Center - Cloud Practitioner: Foundations
Badges.description: I successfully completed the AWS Skills Centers: Becoming a Cloud Practitioner course, where I gained hands-on knowledge of AWS core services, including compute, security, storage, and database solutions. This experience solidified my foundational skills in cloud architecture and AWS best practices.

Badges.title: Operating Systems Basics
Badges.description: I completed the Operating Systems Basics course by Cisco, where I gained a solid understanding of fundamental OS concepts. This includes explaining the purpose and characteristics of operating systems, implementing basic OS security measures, and configuring mobile device network connectivity and email.

Badges.title: Python Essentials 1
Badges.description: I successfully completed the Python Essentials 1 course, where I mastered core programming concepts, Python syntax, and semantics. I also developed the ability to tackle essential coding tasks and solve implementation challenges using the Python Standard Library.

Badges.title: C++ Essentials 1
Badges.description: I successfully completed the C++ Essentials 1 course, where I gained a strong understanding of C++ fundamentals. This includes data types, flow control, arrays, pointers, memory management, and structures. I also learned essential programming techniques and the use of basic standard library functions in C++.

Badges.title: LC Studio Achievement - UI/UX
Badges.description: I earned the UI/UX achievement at LC Studio, demonstrating my ability to apply UI/UX principles effectively into website designs using Figma. This experience strengthened my skills in creating intuitive and visually appealing interfaces.

Badges.title: LC Studio Achievement - SCRUM
Badges.description: I earned the SCRUM achievement at LC Studio by presenting a successful Go to Market strategy for a fast food app, SnackShack. This showcased my practical understanding of SCRUM principles, agile methodologies, and effective teamwork in delivering project outcomes.

projects.title: FortuneTrack
projects.description: FortuneTrack is a prediction market and analytics platform built with Vue.js and Node.js. I developed data processing algorithms, interactive data visualizations, and integrated AI for market forecasts. It features secure user authentication, full CRUD operations, and a seamless admin panel. This project highlights my full-stack development skills. Hosted on Firebase.

projects.title: WeatherWise
projects.description: WeatherWise is a weather app using Python (Flask) for the backend and JavaScript for the frontend. I led frontend development and optimized backend scalability by refining API data integration. It fetches real-time weather data from the OpenWeather API. This project strengthened my full-stack skills. Check GitHub for detailed commits.

projects.title: AuraArtistry
projects.description: AuraArtistry is an e-commerce site for beauty products. I built secure RESTful APIs with Node.js, Express.js, and MySQL, managing authentication and product systems. I also added dynamic frontend features like product filtering. The admin panel streamlines site management. This project showcases my backend expertise and teamwork.

projects.title: Snake Game
projects.description: Snake Game is a browser-based game built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. I developed the game logic, collision detection, and score tracking. The game runs smoothly using HTML5 canvas for rendering. User controls are handled through keyboard inputs. This project highlights my JavaScript and game development skills.

projects.title: TimeScape
projects.description: TimeScape is an analogue clock built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. I implemented real-time updates for clock hands and added smooth animations with a gradient background. The design is fully responsive across devices. This project demonstrates my frontend skills in animation and real-time data handling.

projects.title: Temperature Converter
projects.description: Temperature Converter is a web app for converting Celsius, Fahrenheit, and Kelvin. I developed real-time conversion logic in JavaScript with a clean, responsive UI. The app features intuitive inputs and unit selection. This project highlights my JavaScript skills and focus on user-friendly design.

testimonials.title: Abdurahmaan Charif
testimonials.description: Working with Simanye Somdaka has been an absolute pleasure. His portfolio showcases not only his technical prowess but also his dedication to delivering high-quality solutions. What stands out the most is his ability to think critically and creatively, finding innovative solutions to complex problems. His projects demonstrate a deep understanding of software development principles and best practices. Moreover, his collaboration skills are top-notch, he is always willing to lend a helping hand and communicate effectively within the team. I highly recommend Simanye Somdaka to anyone looking for a talented and reliable developer.

testimonials.title: Lonke Hintsho
testimonials.description: I've had the opportunity to collaborate with Simanye Somdaka on several projects, and I must say, his portfolio speaks volumes about his expertise and passion for software development. Each project is a testament to his commitment to excellence and his ability to adapt to different technologies and challenges. What I appreciate most about working with him is his proactive approach to problem-solving, he does not just fix issues but anticipate them and implement preventive measures. Additionally, his code is clean, well-documented, and maintainable, making it easy for others to understand and build upon. Simanye Somdaka is undoubtedly a valuable asset to any team, and I look forward to seeing his continued growth and success in the field.

testimonials.title: Kyle Brink
testimonials.description: Simanye Somdaka's software development portfolio is a testament to his dedication and expertise in the field. Throughout our class projects, Simanye consistently showcased his strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail. His contributions were invaluable, often going above and beyond to ensure the success of our team's projects. His portfolio reflects his ability to tackle diverse challenges and deliver innovative solutions. Simanye's professionalism and collaborative nature make him a pleasure to work with, and I have no doubt that he will excel in any software development role he pursues.

testimonials.title: Mbalentle Diko
testimonials.description: As a classmate of Simanye Somdaka, I have had the pleasure of witnessing his growth and proficiency in software development firsthand. His portfolio is a comprehensive showcase of his technical skills and creativity. Simanye's projects are not only impressive in their execution but also demonstrate his deep understanding of software engineering principles. What sets Simanye apart is his willingness to mentor and assist others. He is always approachable and patient, providing valuable insights and guidance to his peers. I highly recommend Simanye to any team looking for a talented and collaborative software developer.

testimonials.title: Nasheeta Jacobs
testimonials.description: Simanye Somdaka is an exceptional software developer whose portfolio reflects his passion for creating elegant solutions to complex problems. Having worked with him closely on class projects, I can attest to his strong work ethic and commitment to excellence. Simanye's projects stand out for their clarity, efficiency, and attention to user experience. He has a knack for turning ideas into reality and consistently delivers results that exceed expectations. Beyond his technical abilities, Simanye is a fantastic teammate, always ready to lend a helping hand and share his expertise. It's been a pleasure collaborating with him, and I have no doubt that he will continue to thrive in his software development journey.

testimonials.title: Zizipho Copiso
testimonials.description: I've had the privilege of collaborating with Simanye Somdaka on multiple software development projects during our time in class, and I have been consistently impressed by his skills and professionalism. His portfolio showcases a diverse range of projects, each demonstrating his mastery of various programming languages and technologies. Simanye's code is clean, well-structured, and thoroughly documented, making it easy for others to understand and build upon. What truly sets him apart is his proactive approach to problem-solving and his ability to adapt to new challenges with ease. Simanye's contributions have been instrumental to the success of our team, and I have no hesitation in recommending him as a highly capable software developer.
